name: Time Commando
overview: Time Commando fuses together different gameplay elements into a wicked whole. In order to stop a computer virus that threatens the very fabric of time itself, you must travel through history to save the future. Your quest to stop the virus will take you through 20 levels of action set in 9 different historical time periods, including pre-history, ancient Rome, the Old West, and World War II. Learn to use 45 weapons to defeat over 80 different 3D polygonal enemies. Fight cavemen, gunslingers, samurai, knights, robots, and even a dragon or two.
